batch_goal_summary: Diverse, from-scratch alpha brainstorming batch for AAAHFT ES (CME) TBBO research. Objective: generate many concrete, testable hypotheses for high-frequency scalping and market making without relying on the literature-derived Alpha Bank, to maximize idea diversity and avoid convergence on the same mechanisms. Each agent must respect binding constraints: no lookahead (use `ts_recv` as the visibility clock), 1ms one-way latency from signal to CME order update effective time, and $0.58 per side costs ($1.16 round trip) for both maker and taker. Data is TBBO-only (top-of-book + trade print fields), so any hypothesis requiring full depth, hidden liquidity, or true queue position must be marked infeasible or expressed as a TBBO-feasible proxy with caveats. Agents should cover both market-order/taker and limit-order/maker styles, including price-action style pattern logic (e.g., Brooks-like concepts translated to micro time/event/range bars), classic indicator-based scalping automation adapted to microstructure, and robust regime filters/stop logic designed to survive spread widening and volatility spikes. Deliverables must be written to disk as YAML hypotheses with explicit parameter sweeps, diagnostics (heatmaps/plateaus, failure-mode slices, event traces), and cost-feasibility reasoning. No heavy coding; produce research artifacts only.

steps.append_prompt:
Theme: Brooks-style price action translated to microstructure.

Constraints: do NOT read anything under research/alpha_bank/ or research/literature/.

Produce 18 hypotheses, at least:
- 10 using micro-bars (50–500ms time bars OR 50–500 event bars OR 1–3 tick range bars).
- 6 taker/market-order entries (with explicit TP/SL/hold).
- 6 maker/limit-order entries (with toxicity filters and explicit queue-position caveats).

Write artifacts:
- research/alpha_ideation/round1_20260121T100354Z/01_brooks_price_action.md
- research/alpha_ideation/round1_20260121T100354Z/raw_hypotheses_01_brooks_price_action.yaml

Also read: CURRENT_GOAL_20260121T070145Z.md and DATA_AVAILABILITY_CONTRACT.md.

Theme: indicator-based scalping automation adapted to TBBO.

Constraints: do NOT read anything under research/alpha_bank/ or research/literature/.

Produce 18 hypotheses, at least:
- 10 using classic indicators on micro-bars (EMA/RSI/ROC/Bollinger/VWAP deviation/ATR) with explicit bar definitions.
- 6 that include regime filters (spread=1 tick only, min depth, vol regime, time-of-day).
- 6 maker ideas and 6 taker ideas.

Write artifacts:
- research/alpha_ideation/round1_20260121T100354Z/02_indicator_scalping.md
- research/alpha_ideation/round1_20260121T100354Z/raw_hypotheses_02_indicator_scalping.yaml

Also read: CURRENT_GOAL_20260121T070145Z.md and DATA_AVAILABILITY_CONTRACT.md.

Theme: taker breakout/momentum scalps (fast reaction, short holds).

Constraints: do NOT read anything under research/alpha_bank/ or research/literature/.

Produce 18 hypotheses, at least:
- 12 taker-first entry ideas with explicit requirement to clear spread+fees (explain with ticks vs $).
- 6 ideas using trade-intensity / signed tradeflow bursts as triggers.
- 4 ideas that explicitly avoid bad regimes (spread widening, thin depth, volatility spikes).

Write artifacts:
- research/alpha_ideation/round1_20260121T100354Z/03_taker_breakout_momentum.md
- research/alpha_ideation/round1_20260121T100354Z/raw_hypotheses_03_taker_breakout_momentum.yaml

Also read: CURRENT_GOAL_20260121T070145Z.md and DATA_AVAILABILITY_CONTRACT.md.

Theme: taker mean-reversion / fade extremes / liquidity reversion.

Constraints: do NOT read anything under research/alpha_bank/ or research/literature/.

Produce 18 hypotheses, at least:
- 10 fade-style triggers built from micro-bars or event-time features (e.g., spike + exhaustion + pullback entry).
- 6 that use spread/depth filters to avoid catching knives.
- 4 that incorporate 'scratch' exits / timeouts as core to expectancy.

Write artifacts:
- research/alpha_ideation/round1_20260121T100354Z/04_taker_mean_reversion_fades.md
- research/alpha_ideation/round1_20260121T100354Z/raw_hypotheses_04_taker_mean_reversion_fades.yaml

Also read: CURRENT_GOAL_20260121T070145Z.md and DATA_AVAILABILITY_CONTRACT.md.

Theme: passive market making / spread capture under TBBO-only.

Constraints: do NOT read anything under research/alpha_bank/ or research/literature/.

Produce 18 hypotheses, at least:
- 12 maker-first ideas (join best bid/ask, skew, inventory bounds, cancel/replace logic).
- 8 with explicit toxicity detectors (tradeflow imbalance, microprice vs mid, spread changes, depth thinning).
- 6 with 'when NOT to quote' rules (session windows, vol spikes, spread>1).

Write artifacts:
- research/alpha_ideation/round1_20260121T100354Z/05_maker_mm_core.md
- research/alpha_ideation/round1_20260121T100354Z/raw_hypotheses_05_maker_mm_core.yaml

Also read: CURRENT_GOAL_20260121T070145Z.md and DATA_AVAILABILITY_CONTRACT.md.

Theme: maker strategies + explicit anti-adverse-selection / toxicity filtering.

Constraints: do NOT read anything under research/alpha_bank/ or research/literature/.

Produce 18 hypotheses, at least:
- 12 maker-first entries.
- 10 hypotheses framed as 'filters' (i.e., they improve other strategies by avoiding toxic conditions) with clear measurable signals.
- 6 hypotheses that mix maker entry with taker exits (or vice versa) and justify.

Write artifacts:
- research/alpha_ideation/round1_20260121T100354Z/06_maker_toxicity_filters.md
- research/alpha_ideation/round1_20260121T100354Z/raw_hypotheses_06_maker_toxicity_filters.yaml

Also read: CURRENT_GOAL_20260121T070145Z.md and DATA_AVAILABILITY_CONTRACT.md.

Theme: stop logic, risk management, and trade lifecycle design (native stops allowed).

Constraints: do NOT read anything under research/alpha_bank/ or research/literature/.

Produce 18 hypotheses, at least:
- 10 hypotheses about exit logic that materially changes expectancy (time stops, scratch logic, dynamic TP/SL, trailing stops).
- 6 hypotheses about kill-switch / circuit breakers based on TBBO-measurable conditions.
- 6 hypotheses that explicitly target 'many trades/day' while controlling tail risk.

Write artifacts:
- research/alpha_ideation/round1_20260121T100354Z/07_stop_logic_risk.md
- research/alpha_ideation/round1_20260121T100354Z/raw_hypotheses_07_stop_logic_risk.yaml

Also read: CURRENT_GOAL_20260121T070145Z.md and DATA_AVAILABILITY_CONTRACT.md.

Theme: session microstructure and time-of-day edges (Globex vs RTH, open/close windows).

Constraints: do NOT read anything under research/alpha_bank/ or research/literature/.

Produce 18 hypotheses, at least:
- 12 hypotheses that are explicitly time-windowed (e.g., first 5 minutes of RTH, last 10 minutes, lunch lull, Globex reopen).
- 8 hypotheses that combine a time window with a microstructure trigger (spread/depth/trade intensity).
- Include both maker and taker variants where plausible.

Write artifacts:
- research/alpha_ideation/round1_20260121T100354Z/08_session_time_of_day.md
- research/alpha_ideation/round1_20260121T100354Z/raw_hypotheses_08_session_time_of_day.yaml

Also read: CURRENT_GOAL_20260121T070145Z.md and DATA_AVAILABILITY_CONTRACT.md.

Theme: volatility regime, spread widening, depth thinning — and adaptive control.

Constraints: do NOT read anything under research/alpha_bank/ or research/literature/.

Produce 18 hypotheses, at least:
- 10 regime filters that are TBBO-measurable and can be applied to other strategies.
- 6 adaptive execution ideas (switch maker↔taker, widen quotes, reduce holding time) triggered by regime shifts.
- 4 ideas focused on burst-event handling (trade intensity spikes, rapid quote changes).

Write artifacts:
- research/alpha_ideation/round1_20260121T100354Z/09_vol_regime_spread_depth.md
- research/alpha_ideation/round1_20260121T100354Z/raw_hypotheses_09_vol_regime_spread_depth.yaml

Also read: CURRENT_GOAL_20260121T070145Z.md and DATA_AVAILABILITY_CONTRACT.md.

Theme: miscellaneous microstructure hypotheses (unusual, creative, but still testable with TBBO-only).

Constraints: do NOT read anything under research/alpha_bank/ or research/literature/.

Produce 18 hypotheses, at least:
- 8 ideas that are 'non-obvious' (not just imbalance/microprice), but still TBBO-feasible.
- 6 maker/taker hybrid lifecycle designs.
- 6 ideas framed as 'fast falsifiable' (simple test, clear expected signature).

Write artifacts:
- research/alpha_ideation/round1_20260121T100354Z/10_microstructure_misc.md
- research/alpha_ideation/round1_20260121T100354Z/raw_hypotheses_10_microstructure_misc.yaml

Also read: CURRENT_GOAL_20260121T070145Z.md and DATA_AVAILABILITY_CONTRACT.md.

Theme: tape reading proxies — absorption, exhaustion, stop-runs — using only TBBO + trade prints.

Constraints: do NOT read anything under research/alpha_bank/ or research/literature/.

Produce 18 hypotheses, at least:
- 10 ideas built from sequences of trades at bid/ask + how top-of-book sizes react (absorption vs sweep).
- 6 ideas that explicitly define 'stop-run' proxy signatures and how to trade after (reversal vs continuation).
- 6 that include tight timeouts and trace diagnostics as mandatory.

Write artifacts:
- research/alpha_ideation/round1_20260121T100354Z/11_tape_absorption_stopruns.md
- research/alpha_ideation/round1_20260121T100354Z/raw_hypotheses_11_tape_absorption_stopruns.yaml

Also read: CURRENT_GOAL_20260121T070145Z.md and DATA_AVAILABILITY_CONTRACT.md.

Theme: opening-range / first-hour mechanics (high volume, fast microstructure shifts).

Constraints: do NOT read anything under research/alpha_bank/ or research/literature/.

Produce 18 hypotheses, at least:
- 12 hypotheses specifically targeting the first 15–60 minutes of RTH.
- 6 hypotheses that explicitly compare maker vs taker outcomes depending on spread/depth.
- 6 hypotheses that include volatility gating and tail-risk controls.

Write artifacts:
- research/alpha_ideation/round1_20260121T100354Z/12_opening_range_mechanics.md
- research/alpha_ideation/round1_20260121T100354Z/raw_hypotheses_12_opening_range_mechanics.yaml

Also read: CURRENT_GOAL_20260121T070145Z.md and DATA_AVAILABILITY_CONTRACT.md.
